answers.answer: Phone your midwife and see when you're supposed to go back?
Talk to your midwife.Im 25 weeks. Had 3 scans. 1 or 2 blood tests, sugar test for diabetes, plus a regular urine test every month.

Ive been seeing my doctor once a month so far. After 7 month, I ll be seeing her every 2 weeks.Try to find onlinr reviews on your midwife. You might wanna change if she doesnt do what she is supposed to.
We usually see the midwife once a month. If you have your maturnity notes check on the back of them that is where my midwife writes are next appointments each time.

U havent had any type of blood test at all? U should've had a few by now. If u haven't I recommend that u try to change midwife or go to an actual doc. I personally don't trust midwives but it what every u prefer

question: Hi ladies please help me I'm 28 weeks pregnant I've had 2 scans so for but I haven't had blood test or haven't seen the midwives since last scan  my fiveth months I don't know if  I might see the midwives more often or even might to have  more tests  I don't know what to do !  Please tell do I have to worry it's my first child
title: Confuse  28 weeks
